mapper.select: select DISTINCT city_name from restaurant_japan_region where city_name like concat('%',#{cityName},'%');
SELECT DISTINCT concat(station_name,'é§…(',SUBSTRING(location,1,3),')') FROM restaurant_japan_station where station_name like concat('%',#{stationName},'%');

select sm.restaurant_id,sm.seats_num,sm.lunch_start,sm.lunch_end,sm.dinner_start,sm.dinner_end, hr.holiday1,hr.holiday2,hr.holiday3,hr.holiday4,hr.holiday5,hr.holiday6,hr.holiday7, hs.holiday_from1,hs.holiday_to1 from restaurant_seats_menu as sm left join restaurant_holiday_regular as hr on sm.restaurant_id = hr.restaurant_id left join restaurant_holiday_special as hs on sm.restaurant_id = hs.restaurant_id;
